Content:
So I'm looking to build a scrambler, an am trying to find the right candidate.
Here are the things that I am looking for:
Chain drive
2 cylinders
400-800cc
Japanese


Unforunately 2 cylinders AND chain drive cross off a lot of options.
Does anyone know of any bikes that fit these requirements?
